sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Continuation of Ghostsong’s arc. Greater Terandrian politics collide with Noelictus’ failing wards.

sections.title: Royals & Nobility
sections.content: King Nicte’s eccentricities expand. Princess Kadane sanctions crypt entries more often. Seraphel’s ties deepen.

sections.title: Hunters
sections.content: Guild fractures grow. Veterans like Agshiga push military dominance. Piortesenzth awakened again.

sections.title: Events
sections.content: Battlefields across Terandria threatened by ghosts and undead spillovers. Ailendamus presses Noelictus borders.

sections.title: Nyx Threads
sections.content: Nyx confronts both Guild politics and rogue incursions. Darryn-like threats come unannounced, forcing growth in her resilience.
